textBeforeTable: Showing rows 0 - 7  ( 8 total, Query took 6.4536 sec) This is the output:   Friday, April 6, 2012, 5:32 PM Richard Lian Re: Can not find data record in database table context Reply Show parent | Permalink | (1) Useful Average of ratings:   If everything is OK, that query will return one row with contextlevel = 10, but in your case it should return more. SELECT * FROM mdl_context ctx LEFT JOIN mdl_context parent ON ctx.path LIKE CONCAT('%/', parent.id, '/', ctx.id) WHERE parent.id IS NULL OR ctx.path <> CONCAT(parent.path, '/', ctx.id) OK, try this So, can we do a query to locate that particular problem? Ah, I see. The problem is in get_parent_contexts, which means that the problem is with the path for one of your contexts. (I wish I had
